title: New malphite and Jhin skin?
body:
Just an idea i had for a few skins

I would love to see space type theme for malph. Turn him into a broken/demonic meteorite and have his ult turn him into a falling star and or just turn him into a commit charging towards the enemy I think would be  a cool skin to have. The graphics would be amazing. You could also turn that into a bundle with the naut space skin and rumble.

Inregards to Jhin, I think a project jhin skin would be cool. And or you could create a line of METRO SKINS, would be a comical type of skin but you could throw a few other champs into with this idea, you could just turn them into a bunch of flashy, well dressed and or hipster like characters. Like you did with the pool party skins.

replies.body:
Haha ya, first time posting. But I did repost it in the correct place =D

Thanks for the help!

Hey there,

Love the creativity!

However you've posted in the wrong board :(, this board is for Help & Support regarding technical issues with the game.

Your best bet would be to post this under the [Player Creations](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations) or [Miscellaneous](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) boards :).
